subject: College Athletics
Appointments and Executive Changes
lead_paragraph: Luck is leaving his job at West Virginia University to begin his new role as a top executive at the N.C.A.A., where his experience as an athletic director sets him apart.
snippet: Luck is leaving his job at West Virginia University to begin his new role as a top executive at the N.C.A.A., where his experience as an athletic director sets him apart.
